mapper.insert: insert into order_list ( mb_id, or_name, or_addr_zipcode, or_addr_basic, or_addr_detail, or_tel, or_mail, or_price )values( #{mb_id}, #{or_name}, #{or_addr_zipcode}, #{or_addr_basic}, #{or_addr_detail}, #{or_tel}, #{or_mail}, #{or_price} )

insert into order_details(or_code, item_num, dt_amount, dt_price) select #{or_code},c.item_num,c.cart_amount,p.item_price from cart c inner join item_list p on c.item_num = p.item_num where mb_id=#{mb_id}
